titles.title: To extend the temporary suspension of the duty on Calcium bis[monoethyl(3,5-di-tert-butyl-4-hydroxybenzyl) phosphonate].

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 7/26/2001--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend, through December 31, 2004, the suspension of duty on a specified chemical.
